allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT g.id, g.name, g.provider FROM games WHERE g.provider ILIKE ''%vimplay%'' AND g.id = 13590 LIMIT 1;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT id, name, provider FROM games WHERE provider ILIKE ''%vimplay%'' LIMIT 3;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_vimplay_bets FROM bets WHERE game_id IN (SELECT id FROM games WHERE LOWER(provider) LIKE ''%vimplay%'');")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT g.provider, COUNT(*) as bet_count, SUM(b.bet_amount) as total_wagered FROM bets b LEFT JOIN games g ON b.game_id = g.id WHERE b.user_id = 56 GROUP BY g.provider ORDER BY bet_count DESC;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT b.user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT g.provider) as provider_count, COUNT(*) as total_bets FROM bets b LEFT JOIN games g ON b.game_id = g.id GROUP BY b.user_id HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT g.provider) > 1 LIMIT 5;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD='12358Voot#' psql -h 194.102.33.209 -U postgres -d jackpotx-db -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_bets FROM bets;")
